snippet: In coming from a goal down to tie their game against Poland, 1-1, Greece withstood all the fair elements of sport, and some decidedly unfair ones.
abstract: Rob Hughes On Soccer column holds that in coming from a goal down to tie their game against Poland, 1-1, Greece withstood all the fair elements of sport, and some decidedly unfair ones, in their opening match of Euro 2012; other tournament results noted.
lead_paragraph: In coming from a goal down to tie their game against Poland, 1-1, Greece withstood all the fair elements of sport, and some decidedly unfair ones.

headline.seo: Greeks Rally in Euro 2012 Opener to Spoil Poland’s Party
headline.main: Greeks Rally in Opener and Spoil Poland’s Party
headline.print_headline: Greeks Rally in Opener to Spoil Poland’s Party
